long_description: ssl pools is a family-run swimming pool and wet leisure company based in preston, england. we formed in the summer of 2009 and specialise in the design and installation of swimming pools for both domestic and commercial clients. growing quickly since that time we have expanded our skills to cater to the whole wet leisure industry and have completed some truly spectacular projects. offering an individual swimming pool design & build service from start to finish. ssl pools we will bring over 25 years of experience to your swimming pool, spa, steam & sauna room project. what all of our installations have had in common, is the professionalism, quality and exacting standards that characterise every one of our projects. each one unique; each one a truly individual solution to the demands of the individual customer. office number: 01772 862183
